label: 大江匡房
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1041-1111). Great-grandson of Masahira. Father of Takakane. Tutor to the Crown Prince and Chancellor Moromichi. Private waka collection Gō no sochi shū 江帥集. Numerous prose compositions, for instance in HZM and Chōya gunsai. Diary Gōki 江記. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (23), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (2), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (6), Kyūreishū (6), and Wakan kensakushū (4). [匡衡、隆兼、師通、和歌、朝野群載、漢詩、鳩嶺集、和漢兼作集]
